titles.title: Congaree Swamp National Monument Expansion and Wilderness Act
A bill to expand the boundaries of the Congaree Swamp National Monument, to designate wilderness therein, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 2/25/1988--Introduced. Congaree Swamp National Monument Expansion and Wilderness Act - Title I: Wilderness Designation - Designates specified lands within the Congaree Swamp National Monument, South Carolina, as wilderness. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to administer the areas designated as wilderness in accordance with the provisions of the Wilderness Act. Title II: Additions to the Congaree Swamp National Monument - Increases the acreage of the Monument to include an area known as the "Citizens Boundary Proposal for the Monument." Provides additional funds for the acquisition of additional lands for such Monument. Title III: Authorization of Appropriations for National Monument Development - Authorizes appropriations for construction and development within the Monument.
